description: This is a Dart source file defining theming constants and theme configuration for a Flutter mobile app. It includes color palettes, radii, spacing constants, and a comprehensive ThemeData object for styling various UI components following the 'Ocean Professional' theme.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains static color constants representing brand and utility colors used throughout the app.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: Defines static constants for border radii values used in UI components.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: Defines static constants for spacing values based on a 4px grid.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: A ThemeData object configured with custom colors, typography, and component themes to match the Ocean Professional design specification.
